name: tabletable
description: A simple and extremely flexible table component written in React.

scripts.demo-build: $(npm bin)/browserify --extension=.jsx -e src/demo.jsx -t [ babelify --optional es7.objectRestSpread --optional es7.decorators ] -o test/index.js
scripts.demo-watch: $(npm bin)/watchify --extension=.jsx -e src/demo.jsx -t [ babelify --optional es7.objectRestSpread --optional es7.decorators ] -o test/index.js

author: Zeroarc Software
